name: not a game :)
description:
this is a silly game, i own no music used in this, all music used is owned by rpg maker mv epic strings pack , Stanley parable/crows crows in the Easter egg music.

join the hero's of yutuopiaz in a quest to stop the evil zakarothkaplanicus from opening the dream gate and unleashing the everydra into the land, filled with silly jokes, weird reference humor and of course secrets.
